00069 BMLoop *BM_face_other_edge_loop(BMFace *f, BMEdge *e, BMVert *v)
00070 {
00071     BMLoop *l_iter;
00072     BMLoop *l_first;
00073 
00074     /* we could loop around the face too, but turns out this uses a lot
00075      * more iterations (approx double with quads, many more with 5+ ngons) */
00076     l_iter = l_first = e->l;
00077 
00078     do {
00079         if (l_iter->e == e && l_iter->f == f) {
00080             break;
00081         }
00082     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) != l_first);
00083     
00084     return l_iter->v == v ? l_iter->prev : l_iter->next;
00085 }
00086 
00109 BMLoop *BM_face_other_vert_loop(BMFace *f, BMVert *v_prev, BMVert *v)
00110 {
00111     BMIter liter;
00112     BMLoop *l_iter;
00113 
00114     BLI_assert(BM_edge_exists(v_prev, v) != NULL);
00115 
00116     BM_ITER_ELEM (l_iter, &liter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00117         if (l_iter->f == f) {
00118             break;
00119         }
00120     }
00121 
00122     if (l_iter) {
00123         if (l_iter->prev->v == v_prev) {
00124             return l_iter->next;
00125         }
00126         else if (l_iter->next->v == v_prev) {
00127             return l_iter->prev;
00128         }
00129         else {
00130             /* invalid args */
00131             BLI_assert(0);
00132             return NULL;
00133         }
00134     }
00135     else {
00136         /* invalid args */
00137         BLI_assert(0);
00138         return NULL;
00139     }
00140 }
00141 
00158 BMLoop *BM_loop_other_vert_loop(BMLoop *l, BMVert *v)
00159 {
00160 #if 0 /* works but slow */
00161     return BM_face_other_vert_loop(l->f, BM_edge_other_vert(l->e, v), v);
00162 #else
00163     BMEdge *e = l->e;
00164     BMVert *v_prev = BM_edge_other_vert(e, v);
00165     if (l->v == v) {
00166         if (l->prev->v == v_prev) {
00167             return l->next;
00168         }
00169         else {
00170             BLI_assert(l->next->v == v_prev);
00171 
00172             return l->prev;
00173         }
00174     }
00175     else {
00176         BLI_assert(l->v == v_prev);
00177 
00178         if (l->prev->v == v) {
00179             return l->prev->prev;
00180         }
00181         else {
00182             BLI_assert(l->next->v == v);
00183             return l->next->next;
00184         }
00185     }
00186 
00187 
00188 
00189 #endif
00190 }

00196 int BM_vert_in_face(BMFace *f, BMVert *v)
00197 {
00198     BMLoop *l_iter, *l_first;
00199 
00200 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00201     BMLoopList *lst;
00202     for (lst = f->loops.first; lst; lst = lst->next)
00203 #endif
00204     {
00205 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00206         l_iter = l_first = lst->first;
00207 #else
00208         l_iter = l_first = f->l_first;
00209 #endif
00210         do {
00211             if (l_iter->v == v) {
00212                 return TRUE;
00213             }
00214         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00215     }
00216 
00217     return FALSE;
00218 }

00224 int BM_verts_in_face(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f, BMVert **varr, int len)
00225 {
00226     BMLoop *l_iter, *l_first;
00227 
00228 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00229     BMLoopList *lst;
00230 #endif
00231 
00232     int i, count = 0;
00233     
00234     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00235         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, varr[i], BM_OVERLAP);
00236     }
00237 
00238 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00239     for (lst = f->loops.first; lst; lst = lst->next)
00240 #endif
00241     {
00242 
00243 #ifdef USE_BMESH_HOLES
00244         l_iter = l_first = lst->first;
00245 #else
00246         l_iter = l_first = f->l_first;
00247 #endif
00248 
00249         do {
00250             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l_iter->v, BM_OVERLAP)) {
00251                 count++;
00252             }
00253 
00254         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00255     }
00256 
00257     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, varr[i], BM_OVERLAP);
00258 
00259     return count;
00260 }

00265 int BM_edge_in_face(BMFace *f, BMEdge *e)
00266 {
00267     BMLoop *l_iter;
00268     BMLoop *l_first;
00269 
00270     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00271 
00272     do {
00273         if (l_iter->e == e) {
00274             return TRUE;
00275         }
00276     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00277 
00278     return FALSE;
00279 }

00305 BMEdge *BM_vert_other_disk_edge(BMVert *v, BMEdge *e_first)
00306 {
00307     BMLoop *l_a;
00308     int tot = 0;
00309     int i;
00310 
00311     BLI_assert(BM_vert_in_edge(e_first, v));
00312 
00313     l_a = e_first->l;
00314     do {
00315         l_a = BM_loop_other_vert_loop(l_a, v);
00316         l_a = BM_vert_in_edge(l_a->e, v) ? l_a : l_a->prev;
00317         if (BM_edge_is_manifold(l_a->e)) {
00318             l_a = l_a->radial_next;
00319         }
00320         else {
00321             return NULL;
00322         }
00323 
00324         tot++;
00325     } while (l_a != e_first->l);
00326 
00327     /* we know the total, now loop half way */
00328     tot /= 2;
00329     i = 0;
00330 
00331     l_a = e_first->l;
00332     do {
00333         if (i == tot) {
00334             l_a = BM_vert_in_edge(l_a->e, v) ? l_a : l_a->prev;
00335             return l_a->e;
00336         }
00337 
00338         l_a = BM_loop_other_vert_loop(l_a, v);
00339         l_a = BM_vert_in_edge(l_a->e, v) ? l_a : l_a->prev;
00340         if (BM_edge_is_manifold(l_a->e)) {
00341             l_a = l_a->radial_next;
00342         }
00343         /* this wont have changed from the previous loop */
00344 
00345 
00346         i++;
00347     } while (l_a != e_first->l);
00348 
00349     return NULL;
00350 }

00366 int BM_edge_face_pair(BMEdge *e, BMFace **r_fa, BMFace **r_fb)
00367 {
00368     BMLoop *la, *lb;
00369 
00370     if ((la = e->l) &&
00371         (lb = la->radial_next) &&
00372         (lb->radial_next == la))
00373     {
00374         *r_fa = la->f;
00375         *r_fb = lb->f;
00376         return TRUE;
00377     }
00378     else {
00379         *r_fa = NULL;
00380         *r_fb = NULL;
00381         return FALSE;
00382     }
00383 }

00391 int BM_edge_loop_pair(BMEdge *e, BMLoop **r_la, BMLoop **r_lb)
00392 {
00393     BMLoop *la, *lb;
00394 
00395     if ((la = e->l) &&
00396         (lb = la->radial_next) &&
00397         (lb->radial_next == la))
00398     {
00399         *r_la = la;
00400         *r_lb = lb;
00401         return TRUE;
00402     }
00403     else {
00404         *r_la = NULL;
00405         *r_lb = NULL;
00406         return FALSE;
00407     }
00408 }

00418 int BM_vert_edge_count_nonwire(BMVert *v)
00419 {
00420     int count = 0;
00421     BMIter eiter;
00422     BMEdge *edge;
00423     BM_ITER_ELEM (edge, &eiter, v, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00424         if (edge->l) {
00425             count++;
00426         }
00427     }
00428     return count;
00429 }
00433 int BM_edge_face_count(BMEdge *e)
00434 {
00435     int count = 0;
00436 
00437     if (e->l) {
00438         BMLoop *l_iter;
00439         BMLoop *l_first;
00440 
00441         l_iter = l_first = e->l;
00442 
00443         do {
00444             count++;
00445         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) != l_first);
00446     }
00447 
00448     return count;
00449 }

00454 int BM_vert_face_count(BMVert *v)
00455 {
00456     int count = 0;
00457     BMLoop *l;
00458     BMIter iter;
00459 
00460     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &iter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00461         count++;
00462     }
00463 
00464     return count;
00465 #if 0 //this code isn't working
00466     BMEdge *curedge = NULL;
00467 
00468     if (v->e) {
00469         curedge = v->e;
00470         do {
00471             if (curedge->l) count += BM_edge_face_count(curedge);
00472             curedge = bmesh_disk_edge_next(curedge, v);
00473         } while (curedge != v->e);
00474     }
00475     return count;
00476 #endif
00477 }

00483 int BM_vert_is_wire(BMVert *v)
00484 {
00485     BMEdge *curedge;
00486 
00487     if (v->e == NULL) {
00488         return FALSE;
00489     }
00490     
00491     curedge = v->e;
00492     do {
00493         if (curedge->l) {
00494             return FALSE;
00495         }
00496 
00497         curedge = bmesh_disk_edge_next(curedge, v);
00498     } while (curedge != v->e);
00499 
00500     return TRUE;
00501 }
00502 
00507 int BM_edge_is_wire(BMEdge *e)
00508 {
00509     return (e->l) ? FALSE : TRUE;
00510 }
00511 
00519 int BM_vert_is_manifold(BMVert *v)
00520 {
00521     BMEdge *e, *oe;
00522     BMLoop *l;
00523     int len, count, flag;
00524 
00525     if (v->e == NULL) {
00526         /* loose vert */
00527         return FALSE;
00528     }
00529 
00530     /* count edges while looking for non-manifold edges */
00531     len = 0;
00532     oe = e = v->e;
00533     do {
00534         /* loose edge or edge shared by more than two faces,
00535          * edges with 1 face user are OK, otherwise we could
00536          * use BM_edge_is_manifold() here */
00537         if (e->l == NULL || bmesh_radial_length(e->l) > 2) {
00538             return FALSE;
00539         }
00540         len++;
00541     } while ((e = bmesh_disk_edge_next(e, v)) != oe);
00542 
00543     count = 1;
00544     flag = 1;
00545     e = NULL;
00546     oe = v->e;
00547     l = oe->l;
00548     while (e != oe) {
00549         l = (l->v == v) ? l->prev : l->next;
00550         e = l->e;
00551         count++; /* count the edges */
00552 
00553         if (flag && l->radial_next == l) {
00554             /* we've hit the edge of an open mesh, reset once */
00555             flag = 0;
00556             count = 1;
00557             oe = e;
00558             e = NULL;
00559             l = oe->l;
00560         }
00561         else if (l->radial_next == l) {
00562             /* break the loop */
00563             e = oe;
00564         }
00565         else {
00566             l = l->radial_next;
00567         }
00568     }
00569 
00570     if (count < len) {
00571         /* vert shared by multiple regions */
00572         return FALSE;
00573     }
00574 
00575     return TRUE;
00576 }
00577 
00583 #if 1 /* fast path for checking manifold */
00584 int BM_edge_is_manifold(BMEdge *e)
00585 {
00586     const BMLoop *l = e->l;
00587     return (l && (l->radial_next != l) &&             /* not 0 or 1 face users */
00588                  (l->radial_next->radial_next == l)); /* 2 face users */
00589 }
00590 #else
00591 int BM_edge_is_manifold(BMEdge *e)
00592 {
00593     int count = BM_edge_face_count(e);
00594     if (count == 2) {
00595         return TRUE;
00596     }
00597     else {
00598         return FALSE;
00599     }
00600 }
00601 #endif
00602 
00608 #if 1 /* fast path for checking boundary */
00609 int BM_edge_is_boundary(BMEdge *e)
00610 {
00611     const BMLoop *l = e->l;
00612     return (l && (l->radial_next == l));
00613 }
00614 #else
00615 int BM_edge_is_boundary(BMEdge *e)
00616 {
00617     int count = BM_edge_face_count(e);
00618     if (count == 1) {
00619         return TRUE;
00620     }
00621     else {
00622         return FALSE;
00623     }
00624 }
00625 #endif

00630 int BM_face_share_edge_count(BMFace *f1, BMFace *f2)
00631 {
00632     BMLoop *l_iter;
00633     BMLoop *l_first;
00634     int count = 0;
00635     
00636     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f1);
00637     do {
00638         if (bmesh_radial_face_find(l_iter->e, f2)) {
00639             count++;
00640         }
00641     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00642 
00643     return count;
00644 }
00645 
00649 int BM_edge_share_face_count(BMEdge *e1, BMEdge *e2)
00650 {
00651     BMLoop *l;
00652     BMFace *f;
00653 
00654     if (e1->l && e2->l) {
00655         l = e1->l;
00656         do {
00657             f = l->f;
00658             if (bmesh_radial_face_find(e2, f)) {
00659                 return TRUE;
00660             }
00661             l = l->radial_next;
00662         } while (l != e1->l);
00663     }
00664     return FALSE;
00665 }

00670 int BM_edge_share_vert_count(BMEdge *e1, BMEdge *e2)
00671 {
00672     return (e1->v1 == e2->v1 ||
00673             e1->v1 == e2->v2 ||
00674             e1->v2 == e2->v1 ||
00675             e1->v2 == e2->v2);
00676 }
00677 
00681 BMVert *BM_edge_share_vert(BMEdge *e1, BMEdge *e2)
00682 {
00683     if (BM_vert_in_edge(e2, e1->v1)) {
00684         return e1->v1;
00685     }
00686     else if (BM_vert_in_edge(e2, e1->v2)) {
00687         return e1->v2;
00688     }
00689     else {
00690         return NULL;
00691     }
00692 }

00702 BMLoop *BM_face_vert_share_loop(BMFace *f, BMVert *v)
00703 {
00704     BMLoop *l_first;
00705     BMLoop *l_iter;
00706 
00707     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00708     do {
00709         if (l_iter->v == v) {
00710             return l_iter;
00711         }
00712     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00713 
00714     return NULL;
00715 }

00751 void BM_edge_ordered_verts_ex(BMEdge *edge, BMVert **r_v1, BMVert **r_v2,
00752                               BMLoop *edge_loop)
00753 {
00754     BLI_assert(edge_loop->e == edge);
00755     *r_v1 = edge_loop->v;
00756     *r_v2 = edge_loop->next->v;
00757 }

00759 void BM_edge_ordered_verts(BMEdge *edge, BMVert **r_v1, BMVert **r_v2)
00760 {

00770 float BM_loop_calc_face_angle(BMLoop *l)
00771 {
00772     return angle_v3v3v3(l->prev->v->co,
00773                         l->v->co,
00774                         l->next->v->co);
00775 }
00776 
00786 void BM_loop_calc_face_normal(BMLoop *l, float r_normal[3])
00787 {
00788     if (normal_tri_v3(r_normal,
00789                       l->prev->v->co,
00790                       l->v->co,
00791                       l->next->v->co) != 0.0f)
00792     {
00793         return;
00794     }
00795     else {
00796         copy_v3_v3(r_normal, l->f->no);
00797     }
00798 }
00799 
00810 void BM_loop_calc_face_tangent(BMLoop *l, float r_tangent[3])
00811 {
00812     float v_prev[3];
00813     float v_next[3];
00814 
00815     sub_v3_v3v3(v_prev, l->prev->v->co, l->v->co);
00816     sub_v3_v3v3(v_next, l->v->co, l->next->v->co);
00817 
00818     normalize_v3(v_prev);
00819     normalize_v3(v_next);
00820 
00821     if (compare_v3v3(v_prev, v_next, FLT_EPSILON) == FALSE) {
00822         float dir[3];
00823         float nor[3]; /* for this purpose doesn't need to be normalized */
00824         add_v3_v3v3(dir, v_prev, v_next);
00825         cross_v3_v3v3(nor, v_prev, v_next);
00826         cross_v3_v3v3(r_tangent, dir, nor);
00827     }
00828     else {
00829         /* prev/next are the same - compare with face normal since we don't have one */
00830         cross_v3_v3v3(r_tangent, v_next, l->f->no);
00831     }
00832 
00833     normalize_v3(r_tangent);
00834 }
00835 
00844 float BM_edge_calc_face_angle(BMEdge *e)
00845 {
00846     if (BM_edge_is_manifold(e)) {
00847         BMLoop *l1 = e->l;
00848         BMLoop *l2 = e->l->radial_next;
00849         return angle_normalized_v3v3(l1->f->no, l2->f->no);
00850     }
00851     else {
00852         return DEG2RADF(90.0f);
00853     }
00854 }
00855 
00868 void BM_edge_calc_face_tangent(BMEdge *e, BMLoop *e_loop, float r_tangent[3])
00869 {
00870     float tvec[3];
00871     BMVert *v1, *v2;
00872     BM_edge_ordered_verts_ex(e, &v1, &v2, e_loop);
00873 
00874     sub_v3_v3v3(tvec, v1->co, v2->co); /* use for temp storage */
00875     /* note, we could average the tangents of both loops,
00876      * for non flat ngons it will give a better direction */
00877     cross_v3_v3v3(r_tangent, tvec, e_loop->f->no);
00878     normalize_v3(r_tangent);
00879 }
00880 
00888 float BM_vert_calc_edge_angle(BMVert *v)
00889 {
00890     BMEdge *e1, *e2;
00891 
00892     /* saves BM_vert_edge_count(v) and and edge iterator,
00893      * get the edges and count them both at once */
00894 
00895     if ((e1 = v->e) &&
00896         (e2 =  bmesh_disk_edge_next(e1, v)) &&
00897         /* make sure we come full circle and only have 2 connected edges */
00898         (e1 == bmesh_disk_edge_next(e2, v)))
00899     {
00900         BMVert *v1 = BM_edge_other_vert(e1, v);
00901         BMVert *v2 = BM_edge_other_vert(e2, v);
00902 
00903         return M_PI - angle_v3v3v3(v1->co, v->co, v2->co);
00904     }
00905     else {
00906         return DEG2RADF(90.0f);
00907     }
00908 }
00909 
00914 float BM_vert_calc_shell_factor(BMVert *v)
00915 {
00916     BMIter iter;
00917     BMLoop *l;
00918     float accum_shell = 0.0f;
00919     float accum_angle = 0.0f;
00920 
00921     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &iter, v, BM_LOOPS_OF_VERT) {
00922         const float face_angle = BM_loop_calc_face_angle(l);
00923         accum_shell += shell_angle_to_dist(angle_normalized_v3v3(v->no, l->f->no)) * face_angle;
00924         accum_angle += face_angle;
00925     }
00926 
00927     return accum_shell / accum_angle;
00928 }
00929 
00936 BMEdge *BM_edge_exists(BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2)
00937 {
00938     BMIter iter;
00939     BMEdge *e;
00940 
00941     BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &iter, v1, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
00942         if (e->v1 == v2 || e->v2 == v2)
00943             return e;
00944     }
00945 
00946     return NULL;
00947 }
00948 
00959 int BM_face_exists_overlap(BMesh *bm, BMVert **varr, int len, BMFace **r_overlapface)
00960 {
00961     BMIter viter;
00962     BMFace *f;
00963     int i, amount;
00964 
00965     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00966         BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &viter, varr[i], BM_FACES_OF_VERT) {
00967             amount = BM_verts_in_face(bm, f, varr, len);
00968             if (amount >= len) {
00969                 if (r_overlapface) {
00970                     *r_overlapface = f;
00971                 }
00972                 return TRUE;
00973             }
00974         }
00975     }
00976 
00977     if (r_overlapface) {
00978         *r_overlapface = NULL;
00979     }
00980 
00981     return FALSE;
00982 }
00983 
00989 int BM_face_exists(BMesh *bm, BMVert **varr, int len, BMFace **r_existface)
00990 {
00991     BMIter viter;
00992     BMFace *f;
00993     int i, amount;
00994 
00995     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00996         BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &viter, varr[i], BM_FACES_OF_VERT) {
00997             amount = BM_verts_in_face(bm, f, varr, len);
00998             if (amount == len && amount == f->len) {
00999                 if (r_existface) {
01000                     *r_existface = f;
01001                 }
01002                 return TRUE;
01003             }
01004         }
01005     }
01006 
01007     if (r_existface) {
01008         *r_existface = NULL;
01009     }
01010     return FALSE;
01011 }
01012 
01013 
01026 int BM_face_exists_multi(BMVert **varr, BMEdge **earr, int len)
01027 {
01028     BMFace *f;
01029     BMEdge *e;
01030     BMVert *v;
01031     int ok;
01032     int tot_tag;
01033 
01034     BMIter fiter;
01035     BMIter viter;
01036 
01037     int i;
01038 
01039     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
01040         /* save some time by looping over edge faces rather then vert faces
01041          * will still loop over some faces twice but not as many */
01042         BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &fiter, earr[i], BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
01043             BM_elem_flag_disable(f, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
01044             BM_ITER_ELEM (v, &viter, f, BM_VERTS_OF_FACE) {
01045                 BM_elem_flag_disable(v, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
01046             }
01047         }
01048 
01049         /* clear all edge tags */
01050         BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &fiter, varr[i], BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01051             BM_elem_flag_disable(e, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
01052         }
01053     }
01054 
01055     /* now tag all verts and edges in the boundary array as true so
01056      * we can know if a face-vert is from our array */
01057     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
01058         BM_elem_flag_enable(varr[i], BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
01059         BM_elem_flag_enable(earr[i], BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
01060     }
01061 
01062 
01063     /* so! boundary is tagged, everything else cleared */
01064 
01065 
01066     /* 1) tag all faces connected to edges - if all their verts are boundary */
01067     tot_tag = 0;
01068     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
01069         BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &fiter, earr[i], BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
01070             if (!BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG)) {
01071                 ok = TRUE;
01072                 BM_ITER_ELEM (v, &viter, f, BM_VERTS_OF_FACE) {
01073                     if (!BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG)) {
01074                         ok = FALSE;
01075                         break;
01076                     }
01077                 }
01078 
01079                 if (ok) {
01080                     /* we only use boundary verts */
01081                     BM_elem_flag_enable(f, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
01082                     tot_tag++;
01083                 }
01084             }
01085             else {
01086                 /* we already found! */
01087             }
01088         }
01089     }
01090 
01091     if (tot_tag == 0) {
01092         /* no faces use only boundary verts, quit early */
01093         return FALSE;
01094     }
01095 
01096     /* 2) loop over non-boundary edges that use boundary verts,
01097      *    check each have 2 tagges faces connected (faces that only use 'varr' verts) */
01098     ok = TRUE;
01099     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
01100         BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &fiter, varr[i], BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01101 
01102             if (/* non-boundary edge */
01103                 BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG) == FALSE &&
01104                 /* ...using boundary verts */
01105                 BM_elem_flag_test(e->v1, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG) == TRUE &&
01106                 BM_elem_flag_test(e->v2, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG) == TRUE)
01107             {
01108                 int tot_face_tag = 0;
01109                 BM_ITER_ELEM (f, &fiter, e, BM_FACES_OF_EDGE) {
01110                     if (BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG)) {
01111                         tot_face_tag++;
01112                     }
01113                 }
01114 
01115                 if (tot_face_tag != 2) {
01116                     ok = FALSE;
01117                     break;
01118                 }
01119 
01120             }
01121         }
01122 
01123         if (ok == FALSE) {
01124             break;
01125         }
01126     }
01127 
01128     return ok;
01129 }
01130 
01131 /* same as 'BM_face_exists_multi' but built vert array from edges */
01132 int BM_face_exists_multi_edge(BMEdge **earr, int len)
01133 {
01134     BMVert **varr;
01135     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(varr, BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, len, __func__);
01136 
01137     int ok;
01138     int i, i_next;
01139 
01140     /* first check if verts have edges, if not we can bail out early */
01141     ok = TRUE;
01142     for (i = len - 1, i_next = 0; i_next < len; (i = i_next++)) {
01143         if (!(varr[i] = BM_edge_share_vert(earr[i], earr[i_next]))) {
01144             ok = FALSE;
01145             break;
01146         }
01147     }
01148 
01149     if (ok == FALSE) {
01150         BMESH_ASSERT(0);
01151         BLI_array_fixedstack_free(varr);
01152         return FALSE;
01153     }
01154 
01155     ok = BM_face_exists_multi(varr, earr, len);
01156 
01157     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(varr);
01158 
01159     return ok;
01160 }
Generated on Tue Nov 13 2012 11:54:04 for Blender by  doxygen 1.7.4
